segments.text: I found it at a garage sale once .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a find ! So , how much does it cost ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , because I like you ... ninety bucks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ninety dollars is pretty steep . I'll take it for sixty bucks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sixty bucks ? No-can-do , son . You'll be lucky if I go down to eighty-five .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Eighty-five ? That's the best you can do ? I'll come back later ...
segments.speaker: S2
